abstract: Among the iPod Nano’s new features: a microphone, a speaker, an FM radio, a voice recorder, a pedometer that counts how many steps you walk or run, and a camcorder.
snippet: Among the iPod Nano’s new features: a microphone, a speaker, an FM radio, a voice recorder, a pedometer that counts how many steps you walk or run, and a camcorder.
lead_paragraph: Every year at about this time, Apple hosts an auditorium full of reporters and reviewers in California to unveil the new holiday season's iPod/iTunes line--and yesterday was it.

headline.main: Apple’s New Nano: Now The World’s Smallest Camcorder
headline.kicker: From the Desk of David Pogue
